SNA Descritive Analysis from "Projeto Redes de Atenção às pessoas que consomem álcool e outras Drogas em Juiz de Fora-MG   Brazil"  - SNArRDJF

Here you can find a basic script to analysis data from SNArRDJF - this script was elaborated considering its use for orther matrix adjacency data from SNArRDJF - Here we are going to analyse:

# fuull_no_zero_fancy

`#########################
`# Basic Preparation #####
`#########################

##Loading objects generated with 1.Principal.Rmd Script - Please run this script only after run 1.Principal.Rmd
```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.height=12, fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
rm(list = ls()) # removing previous objects to be sure that we don't have objects conflicts name
load("~/SNArRDJF/1.Principal.RData")
```

`# Interactive PLotting ##

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

#Basic Network Interactive Plotting
##Passing some default info
### Vertex 
```{r, echo=T, fig.height=12, fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
V(full_no_zero)$size <- degree(full_no_zero)
V(full_no_zero)$label <- V(full_no_zero)$V5_LABEL_TIPO_NOME
V(full_no_zero)$label.cex <- degree(full_no_zero)/100
V(full_no_zero)$label.color <- "black"
```
### Just in case if we wanna change colors
```{r, echo=T, fig.height=12, fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#V(full_no_zero)$color <- V(full_no_zero)$color # We defined colors in script 1.Principal.Rmd
```
### Changing Edges
```{r, echo=T, fig.height=12, fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
E(full_no_zero)$weight <- E(full_no_zero)$weight
E(full_no_zero)$width <- E(full_no_zero)$weight
E(full_no_zero)$color <- "gray"
```

#Interactive Plotting - fuull_no_zero_fancy
```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.height=12, fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
visIgraph(full_no_zero, physics =TRUE, smooth = TRUE, type = "full", randomSeed = 123) %>%
  visOptions(width = "100%", height = "90%",
             highlightNearest = list(enabled = TRUE, degree =1, hover = TRUE),
             nodesIdSelection = list(enabled = TRUE)) %>%
  visInteraction(hover = TRUE, navigationButtons = TRUE) %>%
  visGroups()
```
#Saving objects with new variables and changes
```{r, echo=T, fig.height=12, fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
save.image("~/SNArRDJF/Robject/0_interactive_full_no_zero.RData") 
```
